text: How do you get on records? Well, you've got to have something different. Sing slightly flat. All the good singers sing in tune. Twang a guitar slightly off key. 2pianna instead of a new one. You got to get it into your head, son... people don't like things as they should be - not on record, anyway.
handwritten_text: How do you get on records? Well, you've got to have something different. Sing slightly flat. All the good singers sing in tune. Twang a guitar slightly off key. 2pianna instead of a new one. You got to get it into your head, son... people don't like things as they should be - not on record, anyway.
